name: Blades And Honor
description:
Blades And Honor is an adventure game where you must fight dozens of gladiators in the arena to reach the ultimate glory - will you manage kill them all?

Are you feeling like swinging a sword and slashing through enemies?

Do you want to prove your battle skills?

Are you a warrior or not?!

Then this is the game for you!!!

The best features:

  • You are a gladiator that must win the battles to prove himself!
  • Amazing tournaments!
  • Real - life graphics!
  • Autosave system!
  • Battlecry sounds!
  • Archers, Monsters, Soldiers - Fight them all upon the eyes of thousands of spectators!
  • Fight demons in their own realm!
  • Choose among the elite league of gladiators to play with!
  • Scary, exciting, amazing textures!

Controls:

  • Move: W,A,S,D
  • Attack: Left Mouse Button
  • Pause: ESCAPE
  • Go back (To main menu, or to map): Q
  • Other instructions are in the game!

So swing your blades and prove your honor - play Blades And Honor ! ! !
